summary: An endocrinologist in a dysfunctional marriage with an aging, alcoholic wife journeys to Africa seeking a drug that will restore youth.
cast: Coleen Gray|Grant Williams|Phillip Terry|Gloria Talbott|John Van Dreelen|Estelle Hemsley|Kim Hamilton|Arthur Batanides|Murray Alper|Harold Goodwin|Chester Jones|Charles Keane|Paul Thompson
keywords: psychotronic film|breaking down a door|camp|africa|dysfunctional marriage
title: The Leech Woman
